definitions: able to be discovered or identified

examples.text: an easily detectable and treatable disorder
the virus is not yet detectable in the blood

shortDefinitions: able to be discovered or identified

definitions: able to be perceived or noticed; discernible

examples.text: there is a detectable note of bitterness when he talks of his father
Yvette responded finally, her French accent barely detectable

shortDefinitions: able to be perceived or noticed
